				IN RE RETIREMENT OF THE HONORABLE CLANCY SMITH2017 OK CR 11Case Number: CCAD-2017-4Decided: 06/01/2017IN RE: RETIREMENT OF THE HONORABLE CLANCY SMITH
Cite as: 2017 OK CR 11, __  __

				

 




ORDER COMMEMORIATING SERVICE


¶1 NOW, on this 1st day of June, 2017, the Oklahoma Court of Criminal Appeals, sitting en banc to honor the stewardship of Judge Clancy Smith for her many years of service to the citizens of the State of Oklahoma, directs the following comments of her colleagues and citation of appreciation to be spread of record to commemorate her steadfast devotion to the Oklahoma Judicial System.

COMMENTS OF THE COURT

¶2 Presiding Judge Gary L. Lumpkin: Clancy, you have invigorated the Court with your zest for life, energetic engagement in the interpr...
